Cape_Coral.WJGO:
WJGO is a commercial radio station located in Tice, Florida, broadcasting to the Cape Coral-Fort Myers area on 102.9 FM. It airs an adult hits music format branded as "Bob FM". Bob FM currently airs a blend of music from the 1970s to 2000s with a position of "We Play Anything"


== WJGO today ==
Currently Bob plays all of his favorites in the order he chooses. Bob also likes to relive many of his memories of Southwest Florida.
